### Info

ID: `demux`  
Namespace: `ingestion`

### Command

```bash
nextflow run openpipelines-bio/openpipeline -r main_build -main-script workflows/ingestion/demux/main.nf --help
```

### Links
[Source](https://github.com/openpipelines-bio/openpipeline/blob/main/workflows/ingestion/demux){.btn-action .btn-sm .btn-info .btn role="button"}
:::

Convert bcl files to fastq files using bcl2fastq, bcl-convert or cellranger mkfastq


## Argument group

### Arguments



:::{.column-body-outset}
|Name               |Description                                                    |Attributes                           |
|:------------------|:--------------------------------------------------------------|:------------------------------------|
|`--id`             |ID of the sample.                                              |`string`, required, example: "foo"   |
|`--input`          |Input run directory                                            |`file`, required, example: "bcl_dir" |
|`--sample_sheet`   |Pointer to the sample sheet                                    |`file`, required, example: "bcl_dir" |
|`--demultiplexer`  |The multiplexer to use, one of bclconvert or mkfastq           |`string`, example: "bclconvert"      |
|`--ignore_missing` |Should the demultiplexer ignore missing entities (filter, ...) |`boolean`                            |
:::
